page.title: 06CHELTENHAM HOUSING ESTATES
page.content: Wymans Brook area is covered by modern,privately owned{housing}estate} with roads named after famous race- horses, (winners of Cheltenham Gold Cup and other National Hunt Races.) { Home life}of residents, mainly young married couples, embraces ownership of a car,TV/video, washing machine, refrigerator and gas central heating. They take an annual holiday, and for { {entertainment }visit local pubs,clubs and restaurants. In Princess Elizabeth Way (opened by and named after Queen Elizabeth 11) blocks of flats have the names of Commonwealth countries. Leading off this road is another estate with streets named after local councillors. In the St.Marks area, roads are named after English Romantic poets.
